description: Sets the certificate that terminates the specified listener's SSL connections. The specified certificate replaces any prior certificate that was used on the same load balancer and port. For more information about updating your SSL certificate, see Replace the SSL Certificate for Your Load Balancer in the Classic Load Balancers Guide.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerName
parameters.description: The name of the load balancer.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerPort
parameters.description: The port that uses the specified SSL certificate.

parameters.name: SSLCertificateId
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SSL certificate.
